definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
to not move a single jot (idiom)
erhua variant of 紋絲|纹丝[wen2 si1]

sentences.english: I pulled and pushed and tried everything, but it didn't move.
sentences.chinese: 我又拉又推用尽一切方法，但它却纹丝不动。

sentences.english: The fence remained intact but the ram injured its own horns.
sentences.chinese: 结果篱笆纹丝不动，它反把自己的犄角碰伤了。

sentences.english: In front of me the three sleepers did not stir.
sentences.chinese: 在我前面，三只瞌睡虫纹丝不动。

sentences.english: Patience and the ability to sit silently without making a move are a good start.
sentences.chinese: 非凡的耐心与纹丝不动的静坐也许是个良好开端。

sentences.english: Hanna listened standing up, straightbacked, and absolutely motionless.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜起立听着宣读，挺挺身子，纹丝不动。

sentences.english: Jim stopped inside the door, as immovable as a dog smelling a bird.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆站在屋里的门口边，纹丝不动地好像闻鸟狗。

sentences.english: The girl had left most of her meals untouched outside her cabin door.
sentences.chinese: 女孩最近对留在她舱位门外的餐饭纹丝未动。

sentences.english: Johnsy lay, scarcely making a ripple under the bedclothes, with her face toward the window.
sentences.chinese: 琼西躺着，脸朝着窗口，被子底下的身体纹丝不动。

sentences.english: There wasn't a breath of wind – the branches were motionless.
sentences.chinese: 一丝风都没有，树枝纹丝不动。

sentences.english: My wings beat in a frenzy, but the Grail would not move.
sentences.chinese: 我的翅膀疯狂地扑打着，圣杯却纹丝不动。

sentences.english: Li Wu body tolerate the pain and the hearts of sadness, absolutely still.
sentences.chinese: 李武强忍身上的剧痛和心中的悲伤，纹丝不动。

sentences.english: He even tried kicking the huge lump of gold. But again it wouldn’t budge an inch!
sentences.chinese: 他甚至去踢金块，但是金块仍然纹丝不动。

sentences.english: The part had a tight fit inside the sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 该零件纹丝合缝地固定在套筒内。

sentences.english: But I waited until the middle of the night, until morning, it ran untouched either.
sentences.chinese: 但我一直等到夜深，等到凌晨，它任然纹丝未动。

sentences.english: The company faced the bridge, staring stonily, motionless.
sentences.chinese: 整列士兵面向大桥，面无表情地凝视前方，纹丝不动。

definition: to not move a single jot (idiom)
absolutely still/fig. not the slightest change/also written 文風不動|文风不动
back to where we were (idiom); absolutely no improvement/Things haven't changed at all.
original spot/previous place/where it was before
not to glance sideways (idiom)/to gaze fixedly/to be fully concentrated/to preserve a correct attitude
